text:
The creator of ClawdBot/MoltBot/OpenClaw: 
"I ship code I don't read"
Installing clawdbot was a bad idea

Honestly the real question is: will there be a blooper reel when agents go completely off the rails? Imagine an agent accidentally starts a crypto rug pull while trying to automate Twitter. May the best Clawdbot win (and please don't let it steal my passwords).
